name: BeoCniht
description:
Move with arrow keys or WASD and eat honey to survive. The wild bears try to destroy your hive, but the triceratopses just sort of hate you.

This game was made in 5 days for Jame Gam #14. The theme was "Fight or Flight", so we made a game where you can beat some enemies, but can't beat other enemies.

Spritework by Floris P. Fleur

Font (Blazma-X3eVP) by GGbot

Programming and music by Sighet_Someone
